name: Cover
description: Automates studio attendance reports into professional invoices. Built for independent instructors who'd rather teach than do admin.

name: Nudge
description: Real-time synced reminders across all your iOS and Android devices. Dismiss or snooze on one, updated everywhere. Simple, persistent, always in sync.

name: Placed
description: Generate AI art or upscale your own images. Visualize them on your walls, then print and buy in high quality. From idea to framed piece, all in one place.

name: Latent Wonder
description: Experiments at the intersection of generative AI and human creativity. Where latent space meets wonder.

name: Season
description: Drop your biography, get a full fictional discography. A viral profile generator that turns your life story into albums, tracks, and a shareable artist page.
